thread.title: Ben Johnson

author: Ben Johnson
title: Ben Johnson
text: I had Stuart Larking come and fit a tyre for me in Leeds. Stuart called ahead to let me know he was arriving in the next ten minutes, once he arrived he had the tyre changed in 10 minutes. Stuart was very efficient and even gave me advice on some other motoring questions. Overall very happy getting my tyre from tyresonthedrive, from ordering to fitting it was a very fast and easy process, would use again!
